show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Deep Politics and Dark Events
content:
On the Project Censored show, with Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips, we listen to a lecture on Deep Politics and Dark... <!--more--> Events by Dr Peter Dale Scott which he delivered March 19, at the Hillside Club, Berkeley California.
Peter Dale Scott discloses how the Continuity of Government communications systems were likely used by government officials during 9/11 and the JFK assassination.
And how both events and many more show patterns of deep state involvements by US intelligence agencies.
Show includes discussion and analysis by the hosts.
